bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ninamiolane>@ninamiolane</denchmark-link>
I am trying to use the tool "geomstats". I tried to install it, so I installed Ubuntu 18.04 and all of the tools introduced in the readme files of geomstats exactly. After that I try to execute: 1) nose2, run.sh ( from geomstats-master folder ), and 2) mnist_hypersphere.py ( from deep_learning folder ). for the first runn I get this error:
KeyError: 'GEOMSTATS_BACKEND' Ran 27 tests in 0.435s FAILED (errors=19)
and for the second execution I get this:
Using TensorFlow backend. Using tensorflow backend x_train shape: (60000, 28, 28, 1) 60000 train samples 10000 test samples Traceback (most recent call last): File "mnist_hypersphere.py", line 54, in kernel_manifold=Hypersphere(hypersphere_dimension))) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/Keras-2.1.6-py3.6.egg/keras/legacy/interfaces.py", line 91, in wrapper File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/Keras-2.1.6-py3.6.egg/keras/layers/convolutional.py", line 465, in init File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/Keras-2.1.6-py3.6.egg/keras/layers/convolutional.py", line 104, in init File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/Keras-2.1.6-py3.6.egg/keras/engine/base_layer.py", line 122, in init TypeError: ('Keyword argument not understood:', 'kernel_manifold')
My settings are: UBUNU 18.04 tensorflow==1.8 python==3.6.7 keras==2.1.6 installed from kerass folder of the tool applications-master and uses tf_patch autograd codecov coverage h5py==2.8.0 matplotlib nose2 numpy==1.16.3 scipy torch==0.4.0 Please help me install it correctly.

comments.comment:
you need to define the backend, from the command line: <denchmark-code>export GEOMSTATS_BACKEND=numpy </denchmark-code>
or <denchmark-code>export GEOMSTATS_BACKEND=tensorflow </denchmark-code>
if you wish to use tensorflow. The example mnist might not work with the latest version of geomstats. If you are still interested, you should probably use the version 1.7. I'm closing this, but feel free to re-open if you are still interested.
